column4: hom mma yɛnhohor hɛnho mfi honam nye sunsum mu fi nyina ho
column5: na yenwie krɔnkrɔnyɛ wɔ Nyankopɔn ho suro mu."

column2: "Hom mbue hom akoma mu mma hɛn: yɛannyɛ obiara bɔn

column5: wɔ hɛn ahohia nyina mu no

column4: na wohiahiaa hɛn ho afa nyina: ɔko etwa hɛn ho ehyia na suro ahyɛ hɛn mu ma."

column2: "Naaso nyia ɔkyekye abrɛfo werɛ no nye Nyankopɔn
column3: ɔnam Titus ne mbae do kyekyee hɛn werɛ:"
na awerɛkyekyer a no werɛ kyekyee wɔ hom mu so; ɔkaa mbrɛ hom esi afe me nye hom nkɔmbɔdzi nye hom mbɔdzembɔ a ɔwɔ mo ho kyerɛɛ me maa m'enyi gyee pii."

column2: "Na sɛ medze nwoma bɔhoow hom werɛ a
column4: sɛ munuu moho mpo a; na muhu dɛ nwoma no
column5: sɛ mber tsiabaa bi mpo a

column4: nnyɛ dɛ hom werɛ howee ntsi a
column5: na dɛ hom werɛ howee kɔr nnuho mu; na hom werɛ hoow Nyankopɔn kwan do
column6: amma hom aannhwer hɛn ho biribi."

column3: ɔyɛ nnuho a wɔdze kɔ nkwagye mu a wonnu ho wɔ ho
hom werɛ a ɔhoow Nyankopɔn do yi ara
column4: ebɛn nhwɛyie na ɔayɛ wɔ hom mu
column10: ebɛn awerdzi! Adze nyina mu hom kyerɛɛ dɛ hom ho tsew wɔ asɛm no mu."

column3: nnyɛ nyia ɔyɛɛ bɔn no ntsi a
column4: eso nnyɛ nyia wɔyɛɛ no bɔn no ntsi a
column5: na mbom ɔno nye dɛ hom nhwɛyie a hom hwɛ hɛn ho bɛda edzi ama hom wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column3: na hɛn awerɛkyekyer mu hɛn enyi gyee mbordo wɔ Titus n'enyigye no ho
column4: osiandɛ hom nyina adwedwe no sunsum."

column2: "Osiandɛ sɛ medze hom hyehyɛɛ moho kyerɛɛ no a
column5: mbrɛ yɛkaa asɛm nyina kyerɛɛ hom nokwar mu no
column6: dɛmara na hɛn ahohyehyɛ a yɛhyehyɛɛ hɛnho wɔ Titus enyim ayɛ nokwar."

column3: dɛ ɔkaa hom nyina hom setsie
column4: mbrɛ hom dze hu nye ahopopo gyee no no."

column2: "Midzi dɛw dɛ adze nyina mu no mowɔ hom mu awerɛhyɛmu."
